Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

10  KSSpace::KSSpace() :
11  fParent( NULL ),
12  fSpaces(),
13  fSurfaces(),
14  fSides()

21  const KSSpace* KSSpace::GetParent() const
22  {
23  return fParent;
24  }
25  KSSpace* KSSpace::GetParent()
26  {
27  return fParent;
28  }
29  void KSSpace::SetParent( KSSpace* aParent )
30  {
31  for( vector< KSSpace* >::iterator tSpaceIt = aParent->fSpaces.begin(); tSpaceIt != aParent->fSpaces.end(); tSpaceIt++ )
32  {
33  if( (*tSpaceIt) == this )
34  {
35  aParent->fSpaces.erase( tSpaceIt );
36  break;
37  }
38  }
39 
40  aParent->fSpaces.push_back( this );
41 
42  this->fParent = aParent;
43 
44  for( vector< KSSide* >::iterator tSideIt = this->fSides.begin(); tSideIt != this->fSides.end(); tSideIt++ )
45  {
46  (*tSideIt)->fOutsideParent = aParent;
47  }
48 
49  return;
50  }
51 
52  int KSSpace::GetSpaceCount() const
53  {
54  return fSpaces.size();
55  }
56  const KSSpace* KSSpace::GetSpace( int anIndex ) const
57  {
58  return fSpaces.at( anIndex );
59  }
60  KSSpace* KSSpace::GetSpace( int anIndex )
61  {
62  return fSpaces.at( anIndex );
63  }
64  void KSSpace::AddSpace( KSSpace* aChild )
65  {
66  for( vector< KSSpace* >::iterator tSpaceIt = this->fSpaces.begin(); tSpaceIt != this->fSpaces.end(); tSpaceIt++ )
67  {
68  if( (*tSpaceIt) == aChild )
69  {
70  this->fSpaces.erase( tSpaceIt );
71  break;
72  }
73  }
74 
75  this->fSpaces.push_back( aChild );
76 
77  aChild->fParent = this;
78 
79  //set outsideparent pointer of sides inside child spaces correctly
80  for( int tChildSideIndex = 0; tChildSideIndex < aChild->GetSideCount(); tChildSideIndex++ )
81  {
82  KSSide* tSide = aChild->GetSide( tChildSideIndex );
83  tSide->fOutsideParent = this;
84  }
85 
86  return;
87  }
88  void KSSpace::RemoveSpace( KSSpace* aChild )
89  {
90  for( vector< KSSpace* >::iterator tSpaceIt = this->fSpaces.begin(); tSpaceIt != this->fSpaces.end(); tSpaceIt++ )
91  {
92  if( (*tSpaceIt) == aChild )
93  {
94  this->fSpaces.erase( tSpaceIt );
95  break;
96  }
97  }
98 
99  aChild->fParent = NULL;
100 
101  return;
102  }
103 
104  int KSSpace::GetSurfaceCount() const
105  {
106  return fSurfaces.size();
107  }

109  {
110  return fSurfaces.at( anIndex );
111  }

114  return fSurfaces.at( anIndex );
115  }
116  void KSSpace::AddSurface( KSSurface* aChild )
117  {
118  for( vector< KSSurface* >::iterator tSurfaceIt = this->fSurfaces.begin(); tSurfaceIt != this->fSurfaces.end(); tSurfaceIt++ )
119  {
120  if( (*tSurfaceIt) == aChild )
121  {
122  this->fSurfaces.erase( tSurfaceIt );
123  break;
124  }
125  }
126 
127  this->fSurfaces.push_back( aChild );
128 
129  aChild->fParent = this;
130 
131  return;
132  }
133  void KSSpace::RemoveSurface( KSSurface* aChild )
134  {
135  for( vector< KSSurface* >::iterator tSurfaceIt = this->fSurfaces.begin(); tSurfaceIt != this->fSurfaces.end(); tSurfaceIt++ )
136  {
137  if( *tSurfaceIt == aChild )
138  {
139  this->fSurfaces.erase( tSurfaceIt );
140  break;
141  }
142  }
143  aChild->fParent = NULL;
144  return;
145  }

156  {

158  }
159  void KSSpace::AddSide( KSSide* aChild )
160  {
161  for( vector< KSSide* >::iterator tSideIt = this->fSides.begin(); tSideIt != this->fSides.end(); tSideIt++ )
162  {
163  if( (*tSideIt) == aChild )
164  {
165  this->fSides.erase( tSideIt );
166  break;
167  }
168  }
169 
170  this->fSides.push_back( aChild );
171 
172  aChild->fInsideParent = this;
173 
174  aChild->fOutsideParent = this->fParent;
175 
176  return;
177  }
178  void KSSpace::RemoveSide( KSSide* aChild )
179  {
180  for( vector< KSSide* >::iterator tSideIt = this->fSides.begin(); tSideIt != this->fSides.end(); tSideIt++ )
181  {
182  if( (*tSideIt) == aChild )
183  {
184  this->fSides.erase( tSideIt );
185  break;
186  }
187  }
188 
189  aChild->fInsideParent = NULL;
190 
191  aChild->fOutsideParent = NULL;
192 
193  return;
194  }
